explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Updated the method to be private static with the name ClearCookies to match existing static call sites in MainActivity, and switched logging to com.janrain.android.utils.LogUtils.logd with fully qualified references to avoid import issues.
exception_handling: none
logic_customization: Lowered the API threshold from Build.VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP_MR1 (22) to Build.VERSION_CODES.LOLLIPOP (21) so removeAllCookies/flush executes on API 21+, while keeping the legacy cookie-clearing logic unchanged for older versions.
refactoring: Renamed the method from clearCookies to ClearCookies and changed its visibility from public to private, preserving the original parameter and behavior.
misc: Updated log message text to clearly indicate the modern vs legacy API paths and removed usage of Log.d and tag-based logging in favor of LogUtils.logd; no new custom API calls beyond LogUtils.logd were introduced.
